alert.note: Alert for South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 25 at 2:10AM CST until December 25 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...South Cass County. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
